choices.text:
in python make a plot that compares two columns in a dataframe.
Sure, here's an example code snippet to create a bar chart comparing the values of two columns in a pandas DataFrame:
```python
import pandas as pd
# Create sample data frame
data = {'col1': [10, 20, 30], 'col2': [5, 8, 12]}
df = pd.DataFrame(data)
# Sort columns alphabetically
df = df.sort_values(['col1', 'col2'])
# Create bar chart
plt.bar(df['col1'], df['col2'])
plt.title('Comparison of col1 and col2')
plt.xlabel('Col1')
plt.ylabel('Col2')
plt.show()
```
This code will create a bar chart with `col1` on the x-axis and `col2` on the y-axis, comparing the values of the two columns in the `df` DataFrame. You can customize the title, labels, and other aspects of the plot as needed.
